Razorclaw followed the scents he'd detected earlier. (Wolveritron and Eclip=
se) he found the cave they'd entered and followed it in. he'd eaten some sm=
all animals on the way so his energy level was returning and his wounds wer=
e almost healed. 

"Is anyone here?" he calls out as both an invitation or =
a challenge. He was still sore from his fight with Mobster and wanted some =
rest. He hoped to get some but didn't expect any. He hadn't tracked his pre=
y this far to sit down to tea.
